ygData.subject: Re: Help me!
ygData.msgSnippet: Iksars are very cool because they regen health very fast, so soloing is easier. The drawback to Iksars is that you are a hated race...so banking anywhere but
ygData.messageBody:
Iksars are very cool because they regen health
very fast, so soloing is easier. The drawback to
Iksars is that you are a hated race...so banking
anywhere but Kunark and Velious is incredibly
tough.<br><br>I find that iksars are kinda of a boring race when
young in that you don't see any other races fighting
along side of you. Once you approach level 16ish,
you'll fight in Lake of Ill Omen, and then you'll see
other races. Get used to staring at other lizards until
then.<br><br>Don't worry about your first character...you probably
won't keep him/her after you've gotten the jist of the
game. And READ, READ, READ out at eq.castersrealm.com.
That's a great resource.<br><br>CoJim, Druid of the 26th
circle<br>Shaojiku, Iksar Monk of the 12th trial<br>Prexus server
